description: Try our easy to follow Potato Salad With Smoky Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Potato salad,Seafood free,Egg free,Low sugar,Christmas leftovers,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Potato,High fibre,Leftover vegetable,Leftovers
name: Potato Salad With Smoky Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook whole potatoes in a steamer over boiling water for 12 minutes or until just tender. Set aside until cool enough to handle, then cut into large pieces and transfer to a serving bowl.
Meanwhile, fry bacon for 5 minutes or until crisp. Cool and chop. Add to bowl with potato, onion, celery and parsley.
Stir sour cream and garam masala together. Drizzle over potato salad and toss gently to combine. Sprinkle with almonds. Serving suggestion: Toss a salsa verde through the potato salad to serve.
